= Credits =

To develop !SchoolMesh, we used some free softare and resources that it's a right thing to mention:

1. The [http://www.symfony-project.org/ symfony framework]

2. Some code of the [http://framework.zend.com/ Zend libraries]

3. The [http://www.odtphp.com/ odtPhp] code, for !OpenOffice/!LibreOffice document generation

4. Some icons from open source collections, like [http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Crystal_Clear Crystal Clear] (GPL) and [http://www.famfamfam.com/archive/silk-icon-set-released/ FamFamFam Silk] (CC Attribution 3.0)

5. Some plugins and libraries, like [http://www.symfony-project.org/plugins/sfTCPDFPlugin sfTCPDFPlugin],  [http://www.tcpdf.org/ TCPDF], [http://www.symfony-project.org/plugins/sfJqueryReloadedPlugin sfJqueryReloadedPlugin], and [http://jquery.com/ jQuery]
